title: An Interview with Laurie Price
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Australia - Armed forces

abstract: 'Don't worry about them, they're not going to give anybody any trouble anymore.'
description: Laurie Price is one of the remaining third of those Australians who served in Korea. He provides sharp detail of the work he performed there on the airfields, the distractions and tensions, even between allies. While the war is long over, it continues to affect Price even today.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002337; In our words: stories from Victorian veterans [September 2010]; Active; 2010
